title: Commutative Property of Addition
text: The commutative property of addition states that if a, $$b$$ are real numbers, then $$a+b=b+a$$.
speech: The commutative property of addition states that if a,  b  are real numbers, then  a, plus b, is equal to b plus a .

title: Re-ordering
text: Using the commutative property of addition on the last two terms, we can reorder the expression into $$\frac{1}{2}+\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)+\frac{7}{8}$$.
speech: Using the commutative property of addition on the last two terms, we can reorder the expression into , 1 half plus negative 1 half plus 7 eights .
